name: The Lost Letters of Harry Williams
name_original: The Lost Letters of Harry Williams
description:
The Lost Letters of Harry Williams is a first person experience for Ludum Dare 45. You play as Leonard, your main mission is to find Harry Williams. He left clues of his where about in letters. Follow the clues carefully.

FEATURES

  • Dynamic Weather System
  • First Person game play
  • Day and night cycle

Please note that the game contains strong language. 

CONTROLS

WASD | Walk

Left Shift | Run

Mouse | Look

J | Open Journal

M | Open Map
